tooltip.title: Comparison Score [Higher is better]
tooltip.content: Proportion of data in source that matches the target.

tooltip.title: Precision [Higher is better]
tooltip.content: The portion of rows in the target that are correctly represented in the source dataset

tooltip.title: Recall [Higher is better]
tooltip.content: The portion of rows in the source that are correctly represented in the target dataset

tooltip.title: Recommendation level's importance mapping
tooltip.content: Gives the recommendation level for proportions of mismatches
